text: Georgetown University is a Catholic university in Washington, D.C. It was started in 1789 by the Jesuit priest John Carroll. It is the oldest Catholic university in the United States of America. In the 19th century, the university sold more than 300 slaves in order to pay for its expansion. ==References== * Category:Association of Jesuit Colleges and Universities Category:Big East Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Washington, D.C. Category:Oak Ridge Associated Universities Category:18th-century establishments in Washington, D.C. Category:1789 establishments in the United States
title: Georgetown University
